name: NETXP LINUX Additional Netcat Detection on Ubuntu
description: Monitors additional rules for detecting netcat on Ubuntu. This rule helps in detecting the presence or use of netcat, a versatile networking tool that can be misused for various malicious activities, including unauthorized access and data exfiltration.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "susp_activity" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
